summary: Audited .claude/ directory (4.7MB, 217 markdown files) and identified ~20,000 tokens loaded at startup from CLAUDE.md (227 lines) and rules files (1,647 lines). Recommendations include trimming CLAUDE.md to ~80 lines, reducing rules to ~500 lines, and adding path-scoping to reduce startup context from ~25,000 to ~5,000 tokens.
